title: Your Friends Are Here
description: Connect with a community of millions of other players. Review games, chat in our community forums, read player written gameguides and more, all in the EA App.

title: A Seamless Transision
description: Don't stress about data transfer. Simply download the EA App and all your games, achievements, and friends will transfer over in the blink of an eye.

title: No Wi-Fi? No problem.
description: With EA Connect you can play offline, and take your love of gaming to new heights.

title: Designed for speed
description: The fast, optimized platform makes it easier than ever to discover, download and play. So jumping into your game takes less time and fewer clicks

title: New Hits & Old Favorites
description: All of your favourite games, one place. Just download, sign in and start paying today!
